Class TeacherAddStudent

java.lang.Object
ticktocktrack.gui.TeacherAddStudent
public class TeacherAddStudent extends Object
Provides a dialog interface for teachers to select and add students to a specific class within a given course, section, and program.

This class handles displaying the student selection dialog, filtering available students, and associating selected students with the class.

  • Method Details

    • showAddStudentSelectionDialog

      public static boolean showAddStudentSelectionDialog(List<Student> allStudents, String courseName, String section, String program, int classId, int teacherId)
      Displays a dialog for the teacher to select and add students to a class.
      Parameters:
      allStudents - the list of all students available for selection
      courseName - the name of the course to which students will be added
      section - the section of the course
      program - the program the course belongs to
      classId - the unique identifier of the class
      teacherId - the unique identifier of the teacher performing the action
      Returns:
      true if students were successfully added, false otherwise or if the dialog was cancelled

    • filterStudents

      private static List<Student> filterStudents(List<Student> students, String section, String program, String yearLevel, Set<Integer> enrolledIds)
      Filters the list of students based on section, program, year level, and excludes those whose IDs are already in the enrolledIds set.
      Parameters:
      students - the list of students to filter
      section - the section filter; "All" means no filtering by section
      program - the program filter; "All" means no filtering by program
      yearLevel - the year level filter; "All" means no filtering by year level
      enrolledIds - the set of student IDs that are already enrolled and should be excluded
      Returns:
      a filtered list of students matching the criteria and not enrolled

    • populateStudentRows

      private static void populateStudentRows(List<Student> students, javafx.scene.layout.VBox container, javafx.scene.control.ListView<Student> selectedListView)
      Populates the given VBox container with rows representing each student in the list, and connects the ListView showing selected students to support interaction.
      Parameters:
      students - the list of students to display as rows
      container - the VBox container where student rows will be added
      selectedListView - the ListView of selected students to update on interactions

    • updateToggleButtonLabel

      private static void updateToggleButtonLabel(javafx.scene.control.Button btn, boolean isSelected)
      Updates the visual label and style of a toggle button based on its selection state.
      Parameters:
      btn - the Button to update
      isSelected - true if the button is selected; false otherwise
